ServeYourSite.Whitelabelitsolutions offers a variety of dedicated server options to suit the needs of clients of all types and sizes. We offer basic, entry-level servers perfect for larger Web sites, corporate needs and small hosting companies and power servers for customers looking to manage large Web applications or a high volume of customer Web sites; with practically any size server in-between.


★Pro Server Package★

• Intel Core i5-3570, Ivy Bridge
• 500 GB Hard Drive
• 8 GB Upgradable Memory
• 4 Dedicated IPV4, Ip's /30 Subnet/124 IPV6 Included
• Redundant Bandwidth/1Gbps Port
• Linux/Windows OS
• Plesk or cPanel/WHM Control Panel options
• Expedited Free Setup 


 Now! $71.99/mo with promo code “LET10” [Order Here!](https://serveyoursite.whitelabelitsolutions.com/web-hosting/dedicated-servers/)
 Regular Price: $79.99

 
Our servers are available with or without management, and most will be provisioned within 1-2 business days. Don’t see what you need, we count with more affordable plans available as well, review our Dedicated server choices to find the configuration that’s right for you. You can find them on the "Order Here" link above. 
 
*Discounts to all orders with this promo code carry discount over into renewals!
*Discounts with this promo code are valid on all pay cycles mo/quarterly/Bi-annually/annually
*Promotional code valid through 02/25/2018

We have teamed up with the best of the best in order to provide clients with industry leading features and technology. These strategic partnerships make Whitelabel IT Solution’s data center located in New Jersey competitive. You can rest easy that the solution you need will work to your specifications. Our Partners include but are not limited to: 

• Google
• Apple 
• Microsoft Certified Partner 

and Many other Brand name trusted Companies!

Network Testing and test IP [available here
](http://whitelabelitsolutions.com/network-tests/)

We use Direct peering to a multitude of companies to increases the speed and reliability of the exchange of communication. Whitelabel ITSolutions is taking out the middleman and providing clients with a direct connection to the top organizations in the market place. Routing to content and service providers allows the company to deliver low latency between clients and other service providers. Read more about it on our [website!](http://whitelabelitsolutions.com/about-us/datacenter/)

Other services we provide include: 

• Web hosting
• VPS hositng
• Reseller hosting
• Domain Services 
• Security services

You can also order by calling Sales @ 201-425-4060 ext 507 and mention your LowEndTalk promo code!  Feel free to visit our [website](https://serveyoursite.whitelabelitsolutions.com/) to learn more about our plans and services!
